content: Netaji Subhash Eastern Regional Centre, Kolkata || Sports Authority of India Cancel Preloader 0 Sports Authority of India Netaji Subhash Eastern Regional Centre, Kolkata Introduction The SAI Eastern Centre was established on 23 rd January, 1983 at Salt Lake City, Kolkata. The centre is responsible for implementing and monitoring SAI schemes in the States of Bihar, Jharkhand, Odissa, West Bengal, Tripura and Andaman & Nicobar Islands. The Centre is spread over an area of 42 acres, having following facilities.
